channel.title: If You Disagree With This Post, You're Joining A Bullying Lynch Mob | Popehat

item.title: If You Disagree With This Post, You're Joining A Bullying Lynch Mob | Popehat
item.author: Theo Jones
item.description: "This can lead to unintended consequences. We may mean to say that words should be rebutted with other words rather than with official coercion, and that the best response to speech we don't like is more speech. But the words we choose can subtly promote the understanding that words are violent acts, and therefore something suitable for regulation."
